column8: BN is not behind a phone survey about voting preferences that set tongues wagging on social media for the past three weeks.Instead, the survey, which asks respondents who they would vote for in the next election, was conducted by PKR vice-president Rafizi Ramli's Invoke Centre for Policy Initiatives (I-CPI).The survey, which ran from Dec 25, 2016 to Jan 17 this year, sparked off concern among some respondents when they heard a recorded female voice asking them whether BN was to be blamed for the rising cost of living.https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/369857
lol... I choose 'not salah BN' and 'vote for BN' sked the call  was from BN.Survey backfired.
